scenes.description: An evacuation plan video is played on the screens at the venue before the concert starts.
The crowd cheers and waves lightsticks as background music plays in the arena.

subtitles.original: ...facility.
subtitles.english: ...facility.

subtitles.original: Those seated in orchestra sections 101 through 105,
subtitles.english: Those seated in orchestra sections 101 through 105,

subtitles.original: walk up the aisles and out onto the concourse.
subtitles.english: walk up the aisles and out onto the concourse.

subtitles.original: Those in the box and club areas,
subtitles.english: Those in the box and club areas,

subtitles.original: exit out of your box or the club onto the concourse.
subtitles.english: exit out of your box or the club onto the concourse.

subtitles.original: Follow directions of YouTube Theater staff,
subtitles.english: Follow directions of YouTube Theater staff,

subtitles.original: who will be available to guide you to the nearest safe exit.
subtitles.english: who will be available to guide you to the nearest safe exit.

subtitles.original: If you're seated on the plaza level sections, walk up the aisles,
subtitles.english: If you're seated on the plaza level sections, walk up the aisles,

subtitles.original: turn left or right, and proceed out the door.
subtitles.english: turn left or right, and proceed out the door.

subtitles.original: Those on the balcony level, walk up the aisles onto the concourse,
subtitles.english: Those on the balcony level, walk up the aisles onto the concourse,

subtitles.original: turn left or right, and continue down the nearest safe stairway
subtitles.english: turn left or right, and continue down the nearest safe stairway

subtitles.original: to the ground-level concourse and out the door.
subtitles.english: to the ground-level concourse and out the door.

subtitles.original: Once outside, please continue to walk away from the facility.
subtitles.english: Once outside, please continue to walk away from the facility.

subtitles.original: Elevators will not be in service during an emergency evacuation.
subtitles.english: Elevators will not be in service during an emergency evacuation.

subtitles.original: YouTube Theater staff will be available to guide and assist you.
subtitles.english: YouTube Theater staff will be available to guide and assist you.

subtitles.original: For those who are unable to use stairs, YouTube Theater staff
subtitles.english: For those who are unable to use stairs, YouTube Theater staff

subtitles.original: will be available to assist you via an evacuation chair.
subtitles.english: will be available to assist you via an evacuation chair.

subtitles.original: This has been the evacuation plan for YouTube Theater.
subtitles.english: This has been the evacuation plan for YouTube Theater.

subtitles.original: Thank you for being prepared ahead of time
subtitles.english: Thank you for being prepared ahead of time

subtitles.original: to respond calmly in an emergency.
subtitles.english: to respond calmly in an emergency.

subtitles.original: Enjoy the event.
